welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Holiday, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for our friendly locals and beautiful scenery, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport houses the ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside F
terminals.description: Airside F is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside Terminal
terminals.description: The airside terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport is used for boarding and disembarking flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport serves all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
